categories: Category:Star Wars: The Clone Wars voice actors

nodes.text: Timothy James "Tim" Curry (born April 19, 1946) is an English actor. He is best known for starring in movies such as The Rocky Horror Picture Show and Clue and doing voice work for The Wild Thornberrys. On February 28, 2013, it was announced that he would officially voice Supreme Chancellor Palpatine/Darth Sidious after Ian Abercrombie's passing.
In 1992, he voiced a character for the pilot episode of Defenders of Dynatron City, an original property created by LucasArts.
